Articles.Content:
And may your Kerbal projects for the coming year be met with profound success!

On a related note:

It occurs to me that Father Christmas's reindeer and sleigh could be exploiting infiniglide and kraken drives. Thoughts?
Merry Kristmas, Happy Chanukkah, Joyous winter solstice!

Frohe Weihnachten Euch allen!

Kraken-Reindeers? Kreepy! Hopefully its a hidden ion engine somewhere...
